data.eml:eml: A new species and first record of the cicada genus Sinotympana Lee, 2009 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Dundubiini) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Thai-Hong, Sanborn, Allen F., Nguyen, Huyen-Thi, Constant, Jerome (2019): A new species and first record of the cicada genus Sinotympana Lee, 2009 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Dundubiini) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 4664 (4): 565-573, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.4.8
